"God blessed me with a lot of heart and no height, and I'll take that any day" - Nate Robinson

Basketball

I’m addicted to the game. Basketball has played an enormous role in my life, as it has fostered essential qualities within me and allowed me to meet some of my greatest friends. To most I’m 5’5”, but I’m 7 feet in heart.
